text: Pfaffenhofen is the name of several places in Europe: In Germany: * Pfaffenhofen an der Ilm, a town in Bavaria * Pfaffenhofen (district), in Bavaria * Pfaffenhofen an der Glonn, a municipality in Dachau, Bavaria * a part of the municipality of Altomünster in Dachau, Bavaria * Pfaffenhofen an der Roth, a municipality in Neu-Ulm, Bavaria * Pfaffenhofen, Baden- Württemberg, a municipality in Heilbronn, Baden-Württemberg In Austria: * Pfaffenhofen, Tyrol, a municipality in Innsbruck-Land, Tyrol ==See also== * Pfaffenhoffen in Alsacia, France
title: Pfaffenhofen
